price: 19 Ne refusez pas par orgueil d’obéir à Allah, je vous apporte des preuves évidentes.
arabic: وَأَن لَّا تَعۡلُواْ عَلَى ٱللَّهِۖ إِنِّيٓ ءَاتِيكُم بِسُلۡطَٰنٖ مُّبِينٖ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: wa-an lā taʿlū ʿalā al-lahi innī ātīkum bisul'ṭānin mubīnin
